quotes: Co-authored 'How will the Macroeconomy be Managed in an Independent East Timor? An East Timorese view' with East Timor President of the Republic, H.E. Jose Ramos-Horta in 2001, published in the IMF’s Finance and Development Magazine.

Co-authored 'National Ownership and International Trusteeship: the Case of Timor-Leste', with Mr. Michael Francino in 2007, published in Boyce James K. and Madalene O’Donnell (eds) in the Peace and the Public Purse: Economic Policies for Postwar Statebuilding.
Retrieved 4 April 2012.
Retrieved 19 September 2012.
Ellis, Eric (7 September 2009). 'Women to watch in Asia: Emilia Pires' (PDF). Forbes Asia. p. 54.
Retrieved 12 August 2023.
